text: 11.18 Jon 4.22, 1 Ko 10.12 Anɨb ak nɨm, nɨbi mab olap be okok ñɨn kɨd okok, chɨn teplep mɨdon, mab ñɨn kɨd nedil okok tap yokɨp mɨdeb agɨl gos ma nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbi gos anɨb agɨl nɨgenɨgabɨm, ak pen nɨbi nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb. Nɨbi mab ñɨn kɨd okok, mab mok ak kɨdɨl ak nop ma ñɨbɨm. Mel. Mab kɨdɨl ak nɨbop mok ñub.
